title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned only for correct implicit differentiation of x​y=x+ y 2 +3. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi aadIhacaaMb8UaamyEaiabg2da9iaadIhacqGHRaWkcaWG5bWdamaa CaaaleqabaWdbiaaikdaaaGccqGHRaWkcaaIZaGaaiOlaaaa@43E6@ Responses may use alternative notation for dy dx , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacaWG5baabaGaamizaiaadIhaaaGaaiilaaaa@3D88@ such as y ′ . title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first two points can be earned in either order.

A response that presents at most one error (copy, derivative, missing parenthesis) in applying the quotient rule or product rule earns the first point.

  • Any error in a presented expression for d 2 y d x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaapaqaa8qacaWGKbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaikdaaaGccaWG 5baapaqaa8qacaWGKbGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaa aaaaa@3F50@ is not eligible for the third point.

To earn the second point, a response must present both occurrences of dy dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacaWG5baabaGaamizaiaadIhaaaaaaa@3CD8@ (or y ′ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWG5bGbauaaaa a@3A05@ ) in their expression for d 2 y d x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaapaqaa8qacaWGKbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaaikdaaaGccaWG 5baapaqaa8qacaWGKbGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYaaaaa aaaaa@3F50@ (or y ″ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWG5bGbayaaaa a@3A06@ ).

A response must have earned both of the first 2 points in order to be eligible for the third point.

The third point is earned with a correct expression for d 2 y d x 2     x,  y = 7,  2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaabcaqaamaala aabaGaamizamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiaadMhaaeaacaWGKbGa amiEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaaGccaaMi8oacaGLiWoadaWgaa WcbaGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiEaiaacYcacaaMc8UaaGPaVlaadMha aiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqpdaqadaqaaiaaiEdacaGGSaGaaGPaVl aaykW7caaIYaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaaabeaaaaa@52BD@ consistent with the declared value of dy dx     x,  y =(7,  2) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaabcaqaamaala aabaGaamizaiaadMhaaeaacaWGKbGaamiEaaaacaaMi8oacaGLiWoa daWgaaWcbaGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiEaiaacYcacaaMc8UaaGPaVl aadMhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqpcaGGOaGaaG4naiaacYcacaaM c8UaaGPaVlaaikdacaGGPaaabeaaaaa@50A8@ from part (b).

The value of d 2 y d x 2     x,  y = 7,  2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaabcaqaamaala aabaGaamizamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiaadMhaaeaacaWGKbGa amiEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaaGccaaMi8oacaGLiWoadaWgaa WcbaGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiEaiaacYcacaaMc8UaaGPaVlaadMha aiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqpdaqadaqaaiaaiEdacaGGSaGaaGPaVl aaykW7caaIYaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaaabeaaaaa@52BD@ does not need to be simplified.
